Author: tzt-t
Text: I hear you, I'm so sorry :( my girlfriend left me a couple weeks ago and it's been terrible. I'm the lowest weight I've ever been in my adult life. After she dumped me I just stopped eating. It became the thing I lived for. I wanted d everyone to see that I'm suffering and get scared about how skinny I am. Including my ex (we're still very very close which is breaking my heart tbh).  I feel like I have absolutely nothing left except my ED. Nothing is going right, I'm in love with someone who doesn't want be in a monogamous relationship, my dad got back news about his heart. Everything is garbage and I genuinely want to die.  This ED shit is hard enough without all the external "life" factors that people experience, and then it gets so much worse when life gives you those damn lemons. I hear you, and even though I've got literally zero advice to offer you because my life is a pit, if you just need to freaking complain and vent or cry and scream or whatever about just how garbage everything is, please message me.
